ABOUTME.AboutText: I'm a German-speaking Fullstack Developer based in Kempten, passionate about creating engaging and intuitive digital experiences. With a strong foundation in frontend development using Angular and JavaScript, as well as backend expertise in Python and Django, I specialize in creating visually appealing and user-friendly applications and websites.
ABOUTME.Location: I am flexible in my working environment and can work effectively both on-site in Kempten or remotely.
ABOUTME.Minded: My passion for technology and continuous learning drives me to take on diverse projects and challenges, helping me grow into a dedicated and skilled developer.
ABOUTME.Profession: In my profession, programming is more than just writing code—it's a creative approach to problem-solving. I take pride in my ability to break down complex technical challenges into simple, user-friendly solutions that bring ideas to life.

SKILLS.SkillText: My journey as a Fullstack Developer has been shaped by a range of diverse projects and continuous learning. With experience in over 15 projects, I bring expertise in frontend technologies like Angular and JavaScript, along with backend skills in Python and Django. Driven by a passion for technology, I am always open to embracing new technologies and methodologies to enhance my skills and stay current in the evolving landscape of web development.
SKILLS.Contact: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.
SKILLS.Interests: I have a special interest in learning

PORTFOLIO.ExploreProjects: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.
PORTFOLIO.VideoPortfolio: Videoportfolio is a video platform for the clear presentation of projects. Videogular serves as a video player. Jasmine and Cypress were used for testing. Tools for documenting the front end and back end were also used. PostgreSQL acts as a reliable database solution in the background.
PORTFOLIO.Join: Join is a Kanban-based project management tool with functions such as login and registration, a contact book and the option to create tasks. Jasmine and Cypress were used for testing. Tools for documenting the front end and back end were also used. SQLite acts as a reliable database solution in the background.
PORTFOLIO.ElPolloLoco: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and poison bottles to fight against the killer chicken.

FEEDBACK.Colleagues: What my colleagues say about me
FEEDBACK.Feedback1: In difficult situations, Mr Dürr was characterised by a very quick and always found good solutions.
FEEDBACK.Feedback2: Mr Dürr always coped well with high workloads and acted calmly and purposefully. He worked very efficiently and purposefully.
FEEDBACK.Feedback3: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

CONTACTME.ContactForm: Contact me trough this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
